website_summaries.verdict: We’re thrilled to see that this adorable Piglet plush is every bit as durable, soft, and well-made as his companion Winnie the Pooh plush.
pros: Piglet looks just as sweet as he is in the animated films
Beans in bottom keep him in place

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations
customer_reviews.text: All the plush toys are soft and huggable. I had to have all of them; just a kid at heart!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Piglet is just too cute and super soft and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Erose

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cute little stuffed animal for my Granddaughter for christmas. She loves it! Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cuddle time!
customer_reviews.text: Darling Piglet just the right size for my Grandson to cuddle. A great buy! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Swineheart

customer_reviews.title: Winnie the Pooh Friends
customer_reviews.text: Piglet sent directly to my 6 year old grandson, a present for his birthday along with my order of Owl and Rabbit. He already has Winnie the Pooh. My daughter informed me that Piglet is truly just right. We await the other two orders, and come May13th, grandson will be given all 3 for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Carol McAllister

customer_reviews.title: my son loves him
customer_reviews.text: Soft and snuggly but he can also withstand all that my six year old puts him through when playing with him. I haven't yet but I know this piglet would easily be able to withstand a wash if need be. My son absolutely loves him.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Had to return for a new piglet. The first one came and it was stuck looking up and a leg was backwards. Got the second and it was a little better but still kind of stuck looking up. If I had to do it all over I’d just order from the Disney store for Piglet.
customer_reviews.author: Karli P.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture. Softer than I imagined. Loving it so far. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love piglet. This is a small, teddy bear size one. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cuddly, cute
customer_reviews.text: Soft plush fabric, great size and very loved by recipient
customer_reviews.author: ckleiss

customer_reviews.title: Just like Disney
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her piglet. I got this as a back up for the one I got her at disney and they are identical. Cant tell them apart. Except I paid a lot less for this one
customer_reviews.author: SAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 28 and still has the one I got her. This one is for her newborn daughter. Gotta keep it going
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My niece puppy LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my niece, a puppy, after she tried stealing one from a visiting little girl. She LOVES it, and even sleeps next to it. Home run.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as decoration for our baby shower and then our nursery! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara spencer

customer_reviews.title: Size incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The product was advertised as 14 1/2 inches long on the Amazon web site. In fact, it is only 9 1/2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Dog

customer_reviews.title: Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter to sleep with while visiting. She has the exact thing at her house and does not go to sleep without it. It is very soft and cuddly and was worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jules S

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: The material is great. The stuffed toy is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Torres

customer_reviews.title: Lovable Piglet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very soft piglet. Not too big but not really small either. Well made. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: eyesovgold

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft piglet and a good size. I wish the ears didn't flop quite so much but it is a great stuffed animal and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gray

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft. Great size too. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this, Pooh, Tigger, and Eeyore for our son. Adorable! He loves them! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Just as it looked adorable stuffed toy of Piglet!
customer_reviews.text: This was also a big hit at a baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Kleinberg

customer_reviews.title: Winnie the pooh cakesmash theme
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my son's cake smash and they were great! Plus, my son LOVES them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Cute Piglet
customer_reviews.text: Great stuffed animal for my 15 mo old. I like that there are some beads or a little weight in the legs so that the piglet has some substance and can sit by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Tilly

customer_reviews.title: So cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: I'm ashamed to say I bought this for myself! So cute ...just as described.... perfect for any piglet fan!
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Very cute; exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.text: This plush toy is extremely soft and cuddly. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrin Narula

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture! Feels soft and my boy loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Day

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the receiver was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly Piglet
customer_reviews.text: Goes great with the rest of the medium Pooh and friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved Piglet and Eeyore. A good size for carrying around and soft for snuggling with.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Jean

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Great little Piglet! Super-cute and well made. Kept one and gave one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: D. Olson

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter will love it .
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with piglet. Nice size and quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy  Sumner  - Crummitt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my sister and she loved it! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Biel

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because one of the feet was sown on crooked!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE it it’s sooo soft and huggable 😍😍😍❤️
customer_reviews.author: jmatua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stuffed Toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this stuffed animal. She takes it everywhere with her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I expected and was sooo soft!!
customer_reviews.author: LWahl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my daughter how is a very big Piglet fan.. She loved it.. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Angel M Holzapfel

customer_reviews.title: Soft Stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: Soft great size for kids to have, also great table or party character decor
customer_reviews.author: allyb

customer_reviews.title: Dirty ish
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit dirty (?) but not bad. Otherwise a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for friend
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a friend of the family. She loves it😄
customer_reviews.author: Brett Marsico

customer_reviews.title: Heartwarming.
customer_reviews.text: My princess is 10 yrs old and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Soft, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! Great quality! Little girl loved it and hugged it constantly !
customer_reviews.author: Shanmari

product_meta.title: Disney Piglet Plush - Winnie The Pooh - Medium - 14 ½ Inches
product_meta.description: So soft. So fun. Stuffed with fluff. Every hug is sure to bring a smile. With authentic Disney sculpturing and embroidered details, Piglet and his plush pals from the Hundred Acre Wood will sweep your cares away.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars230 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
